5116.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ|O you who believe!|197|210|7177$إِذَا|When|57|83|1370$نَـٰجَيْتُمُ|you privately consult|159|185|16733$ٱلرَّسُولَ|the Messenger,|122|148|1284$فَقَدِّمُواْ|then offer|86|99|16734$بَيْنَ يَدَىْ|before|101|114|6469$نَجْوَٮٰكُمْ|your private consultation,|191|218|16735$صَدَقَةً‌ۚ|charity.|79|106|7879$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|91|28$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|115|520$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|80|207$وَأَطْهَرُ‌ۚ|and purer.|89|103|2053$فَإِن|But if|55|83|227$لَّمْ|not|42|70|63$تَجِدُواْ|you find,|78|106|2567$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|131|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|81|184$غَفُورٌ|(is) Oft-Forgiving,|139|153|1499$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|113|1294$

5117.verse: ءَأَشْفَقْتُمْ|Are you afraid|113|123|16736$أَن|to|44|65|655$تُقَدِّمُواْ|offer|81|102|1032$بَيْنَ يَدَىْ|before|101|122|6469$نَجْوَٮٰكُمْ|your private consultation|186|207|16735$صَدَقَـٰتٍ‌ۚ|charities?|97|107|16737$فَإِذْ|Then when|93|101|12443$لَمْ تَفْعَلُواْ|you do not|104|120|16738$وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ|and Allah has forgiven|166|182|16739$عَلَيْكُمْ|you,|76|92|416$فَأَقِيمُواْ|then establish|113|129|4411$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|99|38$وَءَاتُواْ|and give|83|100|440$ٱلزَّكَوٲةَ|the zakah,|90|124|441$وَأَطِيعُواْ|and obey|102|136|3271$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|87|184$وَرَسُولَهُۥ‌ۚ|and His Messenger.|148|182|3790$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|98|167$خَبِيرُۢ|(is) All-Aware|110|210|2091$بِمَا|of what|71|272|43$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do.|92|192|725$

5119.verse: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has prepared|142|150|7814$لَهُمْ|for them|76|92|98$عَذَابًا|a punishment|108|124|2933$شَدِيدًا‌ۖ|severe.|74|90|2934$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, [they]|117|133|106$سَآءَ|evil is|57|73|5131$مَا|what|53|61|262$كَانُواْ|they used to|105|344|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|331|912$

5120.verse: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ|They have taken|132|140|4600$أَيْمَـٰنَهُمْ|their oaths|92|108|7442$جُنَّةً|(as) a cover,|107|123|16742$فَصَدُّواْ|so they hinder|115|131|7436$عَن|from|54|70|1105$سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ|(the) way of Allah,|145|153|15748$فَلَهُمْ|so for them|96|184|623$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|310|72$مُّهِينٌ|humiliating.|94|182|872$

5121.verse: لَّن|Never|58|67|524$تُغْنِىَ|will avail|75|93|2642$عَنْهُمْ|them|66|84|2643$أَمْوَٲلُهُمْ|their wealth|99|117|2644$وَلَآ|and not|71|89|25$أَوْلَـٰدُهُم|their children|106|124|2645$مِّنَ|against|68|86|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|62|606$شَيْــًٔا‌ۚ|(in) anything.|110|126|472$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|115|51$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(will be) companions|155|188|409$ٱلنَّارِ‌ۖ|(of) the Fire,|106|139|410$هُمْ|they,|55|88|49$فِيهَا|in it,|54|70|253$خَـٰلِدُونَ|will abide forever.|137|137|257$

5122.verse: يَوْمَ|(On the) Day|107|119|1057$يَبْعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah will raise them|150|174|5557$جَمِيعًا|all,|78|102|300$فَيَحْلِفُونَ|then they will swear|154|178|16743$لَهُۥ|to Him|62|86|977$كَمَا|as|53|65|110$يَحْلِفُونَ|they swear|94|103|4126$لَكُمْ‌ۖ|to you.|68|87|207$وَيَحْسَبُونَ|And they think|117|136|6358$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|102|461$عَلَىٰ|(are) on|74|93|52$شَىْءٍ‌ۚ|something.|92|111|186$أَلَآ|No doubt!|85|94|105$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|203|106$هُمُ|[they]|62|258|56$ٱلْكَـٰذِبُونَ|(are) the liars.|116|214|10155$

5123.verse: ٱسْتَحْوَذَ|Has overcome|113|126|16744$عَلَيْهِمُ|them|76|101|602$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan,|110|135|379$فَأَنسَـٰهُمْ|so he made them forget|179|204|16745$ذِكْرَ|(the) remembrance|147|160|9017$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|100|606$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|110|51$حِزْبُ|(are the) party|120|148|16746$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ‌ۚ|(of) the Shaitaan.|140|168|1466$أَلَآ|No doubt!|85|113|105$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$حِزْبَ|(the) party|94|134|5073$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ|(of) the Shaitaan,|140|221|1466$هُمُ|they|50|131|56$ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ|(will be) the losers.|148|188|287$

5124.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|89|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|127|20$يُحَآدُّونَ|oppose|94|132|16710$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|91|184$وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ|and His Messenger,|148|186|3790$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|101|51$فِى|(will be) among|121|320|89$ٱلْأَذَلِّينَ|the most humiliated.|155|354|16747$

5125.verse: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has decreed,|142|149|1638$لَأَغْلِبَنَّ|`Surely, I will overcome,|183|197|16748$أَنَا۟|I|42|56|2308$وَرُسُلِىٓ‌ۚ|and My Messengers.`|163|177|11052$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|60|184$قَوِىٌّ|(is) All-Strong,|118|351|7318$عَزِيزٌ|All-Mighty.|91|324|1827$

5116.verse: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

5117.verse: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

5118.verse: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].

5119.verse: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

5120.verse: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment.

5121.verse: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

5122.verse: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.

5123.verse: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.

5124.verse: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.

5125.verse: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
